mapper.select: select id ,plateNumber ,cargoType ,driverName ,supercargoName ,shipperAddress ,deliverAddress ,vehicleType ,ratedTonnage ,ownedName ,businessScope ,businessLicense from cy_whcljb_data order by rksj
select id, entName, entCatogory, entCode, licenseNumber, expDate, registerAddress, productionSite, legalRepresentative, district, street, businessScope from cy_qyjc_data order by rksj;
SELECT id, entName, planSummary, planDetail, planCategory, contact, phone FROM cy_whpqyya_data order by rksj;
